item.title: Control device remotely
item.description: try.plgd.cloud The plgd team operates their own instance of the plgd cloud for free. This cloud instance is integrated with the plgd mobile application available for both iOS and Android based devices. Together with our IoTivity-Lite sample you’re able to onboard and work with your device remotely in couple of seconds. To start right away, follow try.plgd.cloud.

item.title: Deploy your own plgd cloud
item.description: There are multiple ways how to start using / testing the plgd Cloud on your own infrastructure. If you’re just trying to get in touch with this IoT framework, go back to Control device remotely tutorial and use our free try.plgd.cloud instance. In case you want to get in touch with the system localy and you have the Docker installed, use our plgd cloud #Bundle. Deployment using helm chart is in progress.
